ISSUE.TITLE: No margin for "Associated products" panel (edit product page)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to admin area > edit product page 2. Set "product type" to "Grouped (product with variants)". So "Associated products" block is displayed 3. Scroll down and you'll see that it doesn't have margin for "customer roles" input displayed below (see screenshot) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5019111/56219328-3a76a080-606f-11e9-8c78-250c4dc39cfa.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1647 #3695 No margin for "Associated products" panel (edit product page)
